extension.name: Magebridge: RokScroller
extension.author: Yireo/RocketTheme
extension.description: This module is a modified version of the RocketTheme/VirtueMart scroller

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: sorting
field.label: In which Order the products shall be displayed?
field.description: Defines the display order of the products.

field.name: featured
field.label: Featured Products Only
field.description: Display only products that are featured (marked special)

field.name: show_title
field.label: Show Product Title
field.description: Select whether to show the Product title

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show Product Price
field.description: Select whether to show the Product price

field.name: count
field.label: # of Items to display
field.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

field.name: height
field.label: Scroller Height (for vertical only)
field.description: The scroller height in pixel, works only when Vertical direction is selected

field.name: duration
field.label: Transition Duration
field.description: Duration in ms of cross-blend transition

field.name: fxeffect
field.label: Transition Effect
field.description: Any of the available MooTools transitions.

field.name: amount
field.label: Amount per click
field.description: How many pixel to scroll left or right when clicking the arrows

field.name: arrows_effect
field.label: Enable Arrows effect?
field.description: Select whether to enable or disable color effect on arrows

field.name: arrows_color
field.label:
Arrows effect color.
Can be auto or #hex
field.description: Auto or a Hex Color to be assigned to the arrows effect

field.name: autoscroll
field.label: Enable Auto Scrolling
field.description: Select whether to enable or disable the auto scrolling

field.name: scrolldelay
field.label: Delay (seconds)
field.description: Seconds to wait for the auto scrolling to change

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
